extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE (ENGL200 & ENGL290) and (a GPA of 2.4 on all ENGL units) and (registration in an ENGL Major or Medial Plan).
EXCLUSION  No more than 6.0 units from ENGL244; ENGL245; ENGL360

basic.description: A study of poetry, prose, and drama from the late nineteenth century to the mid-twentieth century.
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Modern Literature
